name: Final Four College Basketball Game
overview: A statistics based college basketball game created by Lance Haffner and sold via mail order. FINAL FOUR COLLEGE BASKETBALL & BASKETBALL: THE PRO GAME Each player contributes as they did in real life. Built in Stats Compiler. You determine starting lineup, substitutions, shot selection, passing, offensive and defensive styles of play and more the College game includes 292 teams from the '86-'87 season plus 70 all-time greats.
